website_summaries.verdict: This formulation of probiotics is designed to help men with problems associated with an enlarged prostate.
pros: Works well after antibiotics to restore your body's best balance
cons: Dairy-free and vegetarian, but not vegan

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with these supplements.
customer_reviews.text: They have been pretty good supplements. I am starting my 3rd bottle today. And my bowel cramps aren’t as bad as they were before. My doctor actually suggested I start a probiotic and I started with these after looking at many others. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: A great probiotic for gut and stomach issues (especially after antibiotics)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and excellent company. I've been taking this probiotic for about 30 days now, my stomach and gut are much more settled (after a 6 month course of antibiotics) and I'm far more "regular". The number of active cultures far surpasses anything I was able to find in my local health food store. Just placed an order for another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: anthony c kelley

customer_reviews.title: I have had stomach issues for quite a while. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had stomach issues for quite a while. I just finished my first 30 days with these Probiotic pills and can feel a large improvement. After about the first week the pains I would get in my stomach went away. My digestion has improved. I haven't been on any kind of diet but I have lost some weight since I have been on them which I can only guess comes from the improved digestion. Just ordered my second bottle.

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable Impact from this Product. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Rounding out the three. I have been taking this for some time and I do notice a significant difference when I do and when I do not take it. My gut feels more settled and my bowel movements are more regular when I take this supplement. I am not an expert in this area but these guys make great products and I have been really happy with this probiotic. My kid and wife both take them but this one is made for men and I like that a lot.

product_meta.title: Prostate Research Labs Men’s Probiotic - Digestive Enzyme Supplement Probiotic for Men - Promotes Gut Health and Immune Support - 1 Pack (60 Capsules)
product_meta.description:
Size:1 PackPR LABS MEN’S PROBIOTIC - 30 BILLION CFU

What Are Probiotics?
Probiotics are beneficial bacteria and microflora that reside in the gut. These beneficial bacteria help eliminate bad bacteria and restore balance to the gut’s micro environment. Probiotics are critical in promoting digestion, nurturing immune system function, boosting the synthesis of certain vitamins, and aiding in the absorption of nutrients.

Why PR Labs Men’s Probiotic?
Each PR Labs Men’s Probiotic serving contains 30 billion doctor formulated CFU’s of select live probiotics to promote gut, intestinal and colon health as well as immune support in men. Our probiotic was specifically formulated in a proprietary blend specific for men’s health requirements, including support of a healthy prostate.

Who Needs Probiotics?
Every man over 40 should be taking a daily probiotic supplement. It’s essential to maintain healthy levels of beneficial bacteria all the time since as a group they play a critical role in maintaining overall health, including prostate and immune health.

Ingredients Based on Science & Research
The 10 live strains (30 billion CFU) in each PR Labs Men’s Probiotic serving have been shown individually in third-party research studies and clinical trials to:

 * Promote digestive and intestinal health*
 * Promote better immune health*
 * Support better prostate health*
 * Promote recovery from antibiotic treatment*
 * Help restore the immune system to beneficial levels*
 * Assist in recovery from colds, flu and other immune based disorders*
 * Increase daily energy levels*



Dosage Information
Suggested use is 2 capsules daily. Capsules are soy, dairy and gluten free.

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. They should not be considered medical advice. Always consult a doctor for medical advice. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: IMPROVE GUT FLORA & DIGESTION. PR Labs Men’s Probiotic is a clinical grade probiotic supplement for men who are looking to restore their intestinal microflora, improve digestion, support immune system health and increase daily energy levels!

10 LIVE STRAINS & 30 BILLION CFUs. Restore healthy gut flora and immunity with a plethora of the most beneficial species of probiotics, including Lactobacillus acidophilus / reuteri / rhamnosus, Bifidobacterium longum and many more

DOCTOR FORMULATED FOR MEN. Created by a naturopathic urologist specializing in prostate health, this men’s probiotic contains clinically proven strains of live bacteria to support a healthy prostate, immune system function, and nutrient absorption

ANTIBIOTIC RECOVERY & IBS RELIEF. Restoring healthy gut bacteria levels is essential after antibiotic use, and maintaining proper microflora helps relieve ongoing symptoms of intestinal conditions such as IBS, ulcerative colitis, and Crohn’s disease

PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA. PR Labs’ state-of-the-art manufacturing facility undertakes stringent quality control measures, regularly testing for heavy metals, pesticides, and other contaminants at all stages throughout the manufacturing process
